### Downloads

Download a copy of everything you need to follow along with the presentation^[You will have to unzip this file. If you are unfamiliar with this process, please check the [Unzipping files](/resources/unzipping/) section under Resources for assistance]

<center>
```{r echo=FALSE,eval=TRUE,message=FALSE,purl=FALSE}
loc <- here::here("static", "handouts", "EDP612Week9Materials.zip")

downloadthis::download_file(
  path = loc,
  output_name = "Week 9 Presentation Materials",
  button_label = "&nbsp;&nbsp;&nbsp;<span style='color:#ffffff'>Download</span>",
  button_type = "primary",
  has_icon = TRUE,
  icon = "fa fa-save",
  class = "hvr-sweep-to-left"
  )
```
</center>
